attributes.additional_details: I would like government to do this to help more families stay together.  Lots of parents in our country have had their children took because of a certain few bad social workers and its happing a lot in the UK. Bodycam needs to be worn.
attributes.background: So many children are ending up in the care system because of some really bad social workers. Bodycams would stop this

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign:

'Require all social workers to wear body cameras whilst on duty visiting parents'

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/632509
